trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:health.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].min(43200)}=12 or {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:health.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].last()}=2 or {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:health.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].last()}=3 or {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:health.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].last()}=0
trigger_prototype.name: BBU "{#LOCATION}" health status is {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].last()}=28 or {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.backup_power.[{#LOCATION}].last()}=0
trigger_prototype.name: BBU "{#LOCATION}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Health status of an Ethernet port "{#LOCATION}"
Running status of an Ethernet port "{#LOCATION}"
Health status of an expansion module "{#LOCATION}"
Running status of an expansion module "{#LOCATION}"

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.expboard.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>27 and {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.expboard.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: ExpBoard "{#LOCATION}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.fan.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>27 and {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.fan.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: FAN "{#LOCATION}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Health status of a Fibre Channel port "{#LOCATION}"
Running status of a Fibre Channel port "{#LOCATION}"
Health status of an interface module "{#LOCATION}"
Running status of an interface module "{#LOCATION}"

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.intf_module.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>27 and {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:running.intf_module.[{#LOCATION}].last()}<>2
trigger_prototype.name: InterfaceModule "{#LOCATION}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Health status of a SAS port "{#LOCATION}"
Running status of a SAS port "{#LOCATION}"
Subscribed capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}" in percent
Used capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}" in percent

trigger.expression: {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:huawei_get_state.py["--api_ip={HOST.IP}","--api_port={$API_PORT}","--api_user={$API_USER}","--api_password={$API_PASSWORD}","--storage_name={HOST.NAME}","--status"].count(2h,1,ge)}=40 or {Template Huawei OceanStor Rest-API v2:huawei_get_state.py["--api_ip={HOST.IP}","--api_port={$API_PORT}","--api_user={$API_USER}","--api_password={$API_PASSWORD}","--storage_name={HOST.NAME}","--status"].count(2h,2,ge)}=40
trigger.name: Error occurs on sending metrics
No data from storage in next 1 hour
